about_the_game:
The Kingdom of Fairbridge was saved, this time. While this battle is over in your favor, the war continues. Goblins, Orcs and Troll troops have regrouped in the mountains and prepare for the next brutal onslaught. The kingdoms best, finely crafted Dwarven weapons are now at your disposal. In your hands, this legendary arsenal's special powers may be able to finally defeat this relentless enemy.

Use your towers weapons and command your warriors to push the invading Goblin lead troops out of the Kingdom while finding the secret of their strength.

Take the battle from the castle walls to the mountains, caves and desert valleys that surround the kingdom. Choose your defensive strategy by placing your specialized dwarven weapons around the battle field. Upgrade and improve your weapons as you journey deeper into the homeland of the goblins and a cadre of nefarious underworld dwellers. Turn the tide of battle as the dwarven commander by using explosive charges, bindinding advancing enemies or sound the battle cry to increase your armies strength.

Key Features



  • An easy to pick up introduction to tower defense

  • Hand drawn scenes and animations

  • 32 tower upgrades including uber towers with special abilities

  • 30 enemy types, from the goblin horde to the flying undead

  • 12 map campaign to save the kingdom plus 2 battle maps once the campaign is completed

Experience the FULL thrilling power of the Dwarven mercenary force on your PC!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Macintosh® OS X 10.6-10.8
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ Solo processor 1.0 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: The supported languages for 300 Dwarves on MAC OS X are English and Spanish.
